Uses of Class
base.Player

Packages that use Player
Package
Description
base
Core game classes for the JEST card game.
player
Player type classes for the JEST card game.
strategy
Strategy pattern classes for player decision-making.
strategy.typestrategy
Concrete AI strategy implementations for virtual players.
trophy
Trophy classes for the JEST card game.
visitor
Visitor pattern classes for card scoring.
